amendment.description: An amendment numbered 71 printed in Part B of House Report 118-216 to prohibit funds for the Homeland Intelligence Experts Group.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A039) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A039) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A039) Agreed to by voice vote.
